sanskrit:
तस्मै नमो भगवते कृष्णायाकुण्ठमेधसे ।
यन्मायामोहितधियो भ्रमाम: कर्मवर्त्मसु ॥ ५० ॥
english:
tasmai namo bhagavate
kṛṣṇāyākuṇṭha-medhase
yan-māyā-mohita-dhiyo
bhramāmaḥ karma-vartmasu
translation: Let us offer our obeisances unto Lord Kṛṣṇa, the Supreme Personality of Godhead. His intelligence is never bewildered, whereas we, confused by His power of illusion, are simply wandering about on the paths of fruitive work.
